name: Consume (George Cranton, Cookie_1865)
description:
This is a 2D puzzle game where you must become the objects around you to solve it and continue on...

This game was made by George Cranton and Daniel Cooke (Cookie_1865) for 'Dani's Basement Jam'.

It is much better if you download it then run it in the browser but you can still play it just fine without downloading it.
